alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; North Cass; North Itasca; North St. Louis; South Itasca (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 26 at 9:03PM CST until February 28 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM MONDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to 4 inches and ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...North St. Louis, North Itasca, Central St. Louis, North Cass and South Itasca Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bois Forte Band, Lake Vermilion, Deer Creek and, Nett Lake areas. * WHEN...From 4 AM Monday to midnight CST Monday night. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; North Cass; North Itasca; North St. Louis; South Itasca
